data.description:
Meditate, move, and breathe with us to live a happier, healthier, and more mindful life! Start your 7-day FREE trial today and unlock your full potential. ✨ 

NEW UPDATE: MIXED REALITY 
Bring Hoame, home! Create your dream meditation studio and enjoy your favourite experiences in the comfort of your own home with mixed reality. 

FACE-TO-FACE GUIDANCE
Enjoy 350+ guided meditations with expert instructors. Experience true presence with sound baths, visualizations, body-scans, sleep classes, and more.

MINDFULNESS IN MOTION
Move with intention and get ready to Rise! Our unique mind-body workout will help you find your flow and connect to calm. 
 
BREATHE EASY
Breathe life into your practice with Somatic-style breathwork or shift how you feel with our 10 breathwork trainers. 
 
SERENE SANDBOXES
Rediscover play and touch the stars with our meditative sandbox, Starseed. Interact with hundreds of glowing stars and connect to yourself and the universe.

FREQUENT UPDATES
Our commitment is to always bring new and innovative ways to help you get the most out of your practice!

Are you ready to start your journey? See you on the cushion! 🧘‍♂️🧘‍♀️

changelog.change_log: Fix for Non-Functioning On-Demand/Somatic Breath Content

Get ready to Rise! 

Move with intention in our brand-new mind-body workout series. 

Rise combines fitness and mindfulness to strengthen our mind-body connection. 

In this first practice we find clarity in movement, power in stillness, and focus on building our inner strength. 

Found in Main Menu -> Rise.

Introducing Life Force! 

This experience will help you visually connect to your life force to practice conscious breathing. 
Play around with audible inhales and exhales and watch as the particles respond and react. 

Found in Main Menu -> Mental Fitness -> Escapes.

Get crystal clear on your intentions with our new Crystal Collection! 

This series of 6 crystal themed meditations will introduce you to the properties of each stone as you interact with the crystal in front of you. 

You can find these classes in Main Menu -> On Demand -> Crystals. 

Enjoying these crystal meditations!? Please let us know! – The Hoame Team

Introducing Starseed!

Touch the stars! Move mindfully and unplug in this cosmic sandbox experience to open yourself up to the idea that we are all made of star stuff.

Release Notes

We are excited to announce two new updates:

 

1. Introducing Virtual Studio Collections!

With over 300+ classes in our library (and counting!) we have curated 6 Collections in one convenient spot. Just starting out? Looking for the perfect before-bed practice? Need a bit of a challenge? Missed one of our monthly events? We’ve got you covered in our Virtual Studio Collections! 

 

2. Return to balance with our new Chakra series 

 

This collection of 7 meditations will help you align your energies and open up to healing and peace. Chakras are energy centres within the body and correspond to different major organs and nerves. When they are open and aligned, healing energy is allowed to flow freely through them to allow us to access their benefits!

 

Enjoying these new updates? Please let us know!

 

Catch you on the cushion!

 

- Your Hoame Team

Our latest update brings you 6 more breathwork practices to help you shift your mood with the power of your breath. ✨

Whether you want to unwind before bed, clear ‘stuck’ emotions in the body, or find energy in your day, your breath can take you there! 

💤Bedtime Breath
🧊Cooling Breath
🌊Ocean Breath 
😌Perfect Breath
🔄The Reset 
💪Vagal Toning 

Enjoying our breathwork additions? Please let us know!

Happy breathing!

- The Hoame Team

Update Notes:
- New Breathwork Trainer accessible from the Main Menu
- Naturescapes is now located within the On Demand Menu

New Feature: Leaderboards
- See how your Hoamie score stacks up against other Subscribers

Fixes:
- Adjusted schedule loading behavior for a smoother experience in the Studio Classes menu
- Graphics Fixes and Improvements
